root.TEXT:
Record date: 2065-06-27
HPI: 51 yo F with HTN, DM, CAD, gastritis, depression, s/p CVA returns for f/u.
Very noncompliant with meds and appts
Today c/o significant fatigue. Also occ has left sided chest pressure and DOE. In the past she c/o orthopnea and this is unchanged. CP comes unrelated to exertion. No n/v or radiation/diaphoresis.
In terms of s/o TIA, she denies dizziness, falls, visual changes, ataxia, no syncope or presyncope, no other focal neurologic sx, she does get frquent headaches.
Problems
HTN
DM
CAD:
-EKG with LVH and repol abnlity.
-Stress echo () Limited, only able to walk 0'47". MHR 122 (72%predicted), BP 230/100. Stopped 2/2 dizziness, SOB and SSCP. EKG shwed 1 mm ST depressions in II, III, F, V5-6. Read as c/w but not diagnostic of ischemia. Echo showed baseline EF of 60% with no RWMA. After exercise there was minor nonspecific inferoposterior WMA. Read as no evidence of inducible ischenia (but low sensitivity 2/2 low MHR)
HX OF GASTRITIS BY UGIS H PYLORI +
S/P TAH 2/2 FIBROIDS
OA
Depression
Asthma
s/p CVA
Medications
Humulin 70/30 60 UNITS qpm x 30 days
Insulin REGULAR HUMAN 3 UNITS SC AC+HS , use per sliding scale-2U if 150-200, 4U if 200-250, 6U 250-300, 8U 300-350
Protonix (PANTOPRAZOLE) 40MG TABLET EC take 1 Tablet(s) PO QD
Trazodone 50MG TABLET take 1 Tablet(s) PO qhs PRN insomna
Naprosyn (NAPROXEN) 500MG TABLET take 1 Tablet(s) PO BID
Polytrim (TRIMETHOPRIM/POLYMYXIN B SULFATE) 1 DROP OU Q4-6H x 7 days
Proventil INH 2 PUFFS INH Q 6 H PRN SOB , PRN: SOB/WHEEZING
Azmacort INH 2 PUFF AER BID
Glucophage 500 MG PO BID
Lipitor 40 MG PO QD
Zestoretic (LISINOPRIL/HYDROCHLOROTHIAZIDE) 20-25 TABLET take 1 Tablet(s) PO QD
Ecasa (ASPIRIN ENTERIC COATED) 325MG TABLET EC take 1 Tablet(s) PO QD
Clarinex (DESLORATADINE) 5MG TABLET take 1 Tablet(s) PO QD
Plavix (CLOPIDOGREL) 75 MG PO QD
Paxil (PAROXETINE) 20 MG (20MG TABLET take 1) PO QD
Atenolol 50 MG (50MG TABLET take 1) PO QD
Flucoconzole 150 MG PO x1 x 1 day
Lotrimin 1% CREAM (CLOTRIMAZOLE 1% CREAM) 1 APPLICATION TOP QD , apply to vaginal area (external) qd prn itch
Insulin 70/30 (HUMAN) 30 U/30 U SC QAM/Qpm
EXAM:
VS 138/80 HR 72
Neck No JVD No thyromegaly No carotid bruits
Cor RRR, S1S2, 2/6 sys M at RUSB
Lungs CTA bl, no crackles/wheezes
Abd Soft NTND +BS
Ext No c/c/e
NEURO: PERRL. Facial asymmetry, unable to smile or raise eyebrow on L, tongue deviates to R. Strength 4/5 LUE extensors, o/w 5/5 throughout. Normal gait. Unchanged fr previous
A/P:
53F with MMP incl DM, high chol, depression, s/p TIA, noncompliance, for f/u
1) Recent possible HIV exposure: Neg HIV and other STDs, need to recheck 6 mos after exposure in 12/65
2) DM:
--Now on Humulin 70/30 at 60qam and 30 qpm after off for several mos. Last A1c was 13.9.
--Cont glucophage 500 bid
--cont ASA, statin
--at next visit will schedule eye exam and recheck A1C
3)NEURO-s/p CVA, did not f/u with neurology but will resched appt today. ASA 325 qd, Plavix 75 mg PO QD.
4)CV-Recent stress echo with low sensitivity given poor exercise tolerance but nondiagnostic of ischemia. HTN poorly controlled likely bc pt not compliant with meds.
--Restart Atenolol at 25 qd, likely need to titrate up, used to be on 100. Cont Lisinopril 20/HCTZ 25 qd.
--Cont Lipitor 40 mg qd, will check LFTs and lipid panel in 6-8 weeks
--Cont ASA 325 qd
--Check EKG and resched adenosine MIBI which she has missed multiple times
--check chem 7 given recent restart BP meds
5)PSYCH-Depression. Cont Celexa to 40 qd
6)PULM-Asthma. Cont albuterol and asthmacort
7)GI-GERD. Cont Protonix
8)Fatigue: check TSH and CBC
9)Health Maint:
--Overdue for PAP (last 3 yrs ago), will schedule
--Overdue for Mammo (last 3 yrs ago), will schedule
--check chol,LFTs, renal fxn, cbc
8)F/u in 1 mo
Results
06/27/2065 NA 137, K 3.9, CL 97 (*), CO2 30, BUN 12, CRE 0.7, GLU 372 (*), CA 9.6, TSH 1.798, HCT 41.2

Ione Kerr, M.D.
